description: Collects browser history, bookmarks, downloads, and cookies from Google Chrome, Microsoft Edge, and Mozilla Firefox on Windows endpoints. Outputs structured NDJSON for SOC automation.

script_parameters.name: LogPath
script_parameters.description: Path to the rotating human-readable script log.

script_parameters.name: ARLog
script_parameters.description: Path where the active response JSON result will be stored. Uses overwrite-safe NDJSON logging.

artifacts_collected: Chrome history, bookmarks, downloads, and cookies
Edge history, bookmarks, downloads, and cookies

dependencies.name: PSSQLite
dependencies.description: Required PowerShell module to query browser SQLite databases. Automatically installs if missing.
